name: Village Essence Royal Blue Oversized-Tee
description:
STORY

Village Essence Royal Blue Oversized-Tee.
Celebrate Village Life in Style.
Experience the spirit of rural India with this vibrant blue oversized T-shirt featuring traditional village art, meticulously crafted through high-quality screen printing for lasting clarity and vibrance.

DETAILS

✔️ 100% Pure Cotton - Ultra-soft, breathable fabric, gentle on skin.
✔️ Oversized Youth Fit -Relaxed, street-inspired unisex design for all-day comfort.
✔️ Weight : 240 GSM - Premium thickness, offering a heavy yet soft feel.
✔️ Made in India -  Crafted with skill by local artisans.
✔️  Screen Printed Artwork - Village graphics are applied using professional screen printing, ensuring sharp details, strong color contrast, and resistance to fading or cracking.
✔️ Color - Deep blue base with crisp white village scenes.



ARTWORK FEATURES

- Each motif is applied via multi-layer screen printing for enhanced durability and consistent coverage[1].
- The print will retain its shape and color even after many washes, thanks to the robust screen-printed layer.
- Designed to highlight cultural nuances, from farming and festivities to traditional dance and rural nature.



WASH CARE

- Wash inside out in cold water to maintain the print’s integrity.
- Use mild detergents and avoid bleach to protect fabric and artistic details.
- Do not directly iron on the print area for lasting vibrancy.



This village-themed T-shirt, highlighting its traditional art and the durability provided by professional screen printining

review.reviewBody: Amazing fabric and premium stitching. Highly recommended!

acceptedAnswer.text: Delivery usually takes 5–7 business days across India.
Yes, returns are accepted within 5 days of delivery.
